511710-2_xnnDD.json:22.jp: [textBlack:＜梨花とれんは、クリスマスの精のみたまから]@[textBlack:町のみんなをハッピーにする力を]@[textBlack:分けてもらいましたが]@[textBlack:説明もなく、みたまは突然消えてしまい]@[textBlack:ふたりは困っていました＞]
511710-2_xnnDD.json:22.en: [textBlack:＜Rika and Ren had met a Christmas spirit,]@[textBlack:from whom they received the power]@[textBlack:to make everyone in town happy,]@[textBlack:but there was no explanation how to use it.]@[textBlack:Mitama had suddenly disappeared,]@[textBlack:and now they were in trouble.＞]

511710-4_xnnDD.json:28.jp: [textBlack:＜ヨワムシハートをひとつ追い払ったことで]@[textBlack:少し自信がついたふたりは]@[textBlack:残り９個のヨワムシハートを追い払おうと]@[textBlack:張り切っていました＞]

511710-7_xnnDD.json:31.en: [textBlack:＜They helped a girl struggling with presents;]@[textBlack:encouraged a maid who couldn't dance]@[textBlack:well to perform for a special]@[textBlack:Christmas show...＞]

511710-7_xnnDD.json:37.jp: [textBlack:＜この勢いならすぐに目標達成だ、と]@[textBlack:チュン太は浮かれていましたが]@[textBlack:困った人を放っておけないホーリーガールズが]@[textBlack:ヨワムシハートに関係なく、町の人を助けるので]@[textBlack:チュン太は手を焼いていました＞]
511710-7_xnnDD.json:37.en: [textBlack:＜Chunta believed that with this momentum,]@[textBlack:they would soon attain their goal,]@[textBlack:but was baffled  that the Holy Girls,]@[textBlack:who couldn't abandon people in need,]@[textBlack:were helping everyone regardless of]@[textBlack:whether they had a Coward's Heart.＞]

511710-8_xnnDD.json:31.jp: [textBlack:＜強いヨワムシハートを警戒して]@[textBlack:衣美里とあきらを呼んだれんたちは]@[textBlack:万全な状態で、少年の話を聞き出しました＞]
511710-8_xnnDD.json:31.en: [textBlack:＜Ren and Rika were cautious against]@[textBlack:the strong Coward's Heart and called]@[textBlack:in Emiri and Akira so as to be]@[textBlack:perfectly prepared as they asked]@[textBlack:the boy what was wrong.＞]

511710-9_xnnDD.json:28.jp: [textBlack:＜衣美里とあきらが男の子を追いかけた一方で]@[textBlack:梨花とれんは、チュン太が新たに感じた]@[textBlack:ヨワムシハートの気配を追って]@[textBlack:ショッピングモールに来ていました＞]
511710-9_xnnDD.json:28.en: [textBlack:＜Emiri and Akira chased after the boy,]@[textBlack:while Rika and Ren went to the mall to follow]@[textBlack:Chunta's newly-sensed Coward's Heart.＞]

511710-10_xnnDD.json:22.jp: [textBlack:＜ヨワムシハートの気配を追った先で]@[textBlack:梨花とれんが声を掛けたのは]@[textBlack:１組の若い男女でした＞]
511710-10_xnnDD.json:22.en: [textBlack:＜After following the presence of the Coward's Heart,]@[textBlack:Rika and Ren approached a young man and woman.＞]

511720-1_RlDc1.json:34.jp: [textBlack:＜手伝うために、梨花とれんは]@[textBlack:みたまから魔法の力を分けてもらいました]@[textBlack:ただし、力はふたり揃って１人前]@[textBlack:心が通い合っていないと魔法は使えません＞]
511720-1_RlDc1.json:34.en: [textBlack:＜In order to help her,]@[textBlack:Rika and Ren were given a share]@[textBlack:of Mitama's magical power.]@[textBlack:However, in order to harness it,]@[textBlack:they must use the magic as one,]@[textBlack:with their hearts connected.＞]

511720-5_RlDc1.json:28.jp: [textBlack:＜数体目の魔女を退治した時、梨花とれんは]@[textBlack:ヨワムシハートを壊すか]@[textBlack:チュン太から取り上げれば]@[textBlack:魔女の出現を止められるかもしれないことに]@[textBlack:気付きました＞]
511720-5_RlDc1.json:28.en: [textBlack:＜After defeating a few Witches,]@[textBlack:Rika and Ren realized they might be able to stop]@[textBlack:the Witches from appearing if they broke the]@[textBlack:Coward's Heart or stole it from Chunta.＞]

511720-9_RlDc1.json:796.jp: [textBlack:＜そして、みんなに]@[textBlack:幸せなクリスマスが訪れたのでした＞]

511914-14_drYeT.json:602.jp: [textBlack:こういうのって本当は、みんなでわいわい書いて]@[textBlack:埋めておくものなんだろうけど…]
511914-14_drYeT.json:602.en: [textBlack:Something like this should be written and then buried @with everyone in a boisterous mood, but...]

511914-14_drYeT.json:605.jp: [textBlack:なんか、そういう内容じゃない気がしたから]@[textBlack:ひとりで埋めることにした]
511914-14_drYeT.json:605.en: [textBlack:Somehow that didn’t seem to fit the subject matter, @so I buried it myself.]

511914-14_drYeT.json:608.jp: [textBlack:「村の呪い」についてもし悩んでる子がいたら]@[textBlack:読んでみてほしい]
511914-14_drYeT.json:608.en: [textBlack:If some kid’s worried about the “Village Curse”, @I hope you’ll read this.]

511914-14_drYeT.json:611.jp: [textBlack:そうじゃないなら、別に読む必要もないから]@[textBlack:埋め戻してくれるかな？]
511914-14_drYeT.json:611.en: [textBlack:If that’s not the case, there’s no need to keep reading. @Could you bury this again?]

511914-14_drYeT.json:740.jp: [textBlack:きのう、村に立ち寄った旅人から]@[textBlack:ある人物の消息を聞いて…]
511914-14_drYeT.json:740.en: [textBlack:Yesterday, I heard news about a certain someone @from a traveller visiting the village...]

511914-14_drYeT.json:748.jp: [textBlack:その人物のことを聞けば聞くほど]@[textBlack:不思議な気分になったんだ]
511914-14_drYeT.json:748.en: [textBlack:While listening to things regarding this person, @a sense of amazement grew on me.]

511914-14_drYeT.json:751.jp: [textBlack:その人物は、私がこの村で世話になった先輩で]@[textBlack:だいぶ前に消えたはずの人だったから…]
511914-14_drYeT.json:751.en: [textBlack:That person, appeared to be the senpai who’d taken @care of me in this village and who should have @disappeared a long time ago...]

511914-14_drYeT.json:754.jp: [textBlack:名前も人となりも同じだったから]@[textBlack:たぶん、同一人物に間違いないと思う]
511914-14_drYeT.json:754.en: [textBlack:The name and how their conduct was described were @identical to her, so I thought it @had to be the same person.]

511914-14_drYeT.json:838.jp: [textBlack:そのことを旅人に話したら]@[textBlack:こんな答えが返ってきた]
511914-14_drYeT.json:838.en: [textBlack: When I told the traveller about all of this, @I got this reply in response.]

511914-14_drYeT.json:846.jp: [textBlack:旅人の話では、どの町でも]@[textBlack:いちど消えた人が帰ってきたことはない、って]@[textBlack:…そして旅人は、この村だけが]@[textBlack:特別なのかもしれないって言ったんだ]
511914-14_drYeT.json:846.en: [textBlack:Based on what the traveller said, no matter which @town it was,] [textBlack:there had never once been an instance @of a disappeared person returning.] @[textBlack:...And then the traveller said, @perhaps only this village was special.]

511914-14_drYeT.json:938.jp: [textBlack:人はこの村で、生きるすべを学ぶ…]@[textBlack:出会いと、そして別れをね]
511914-14_drYeT.json:938.en: [textBlack:Here, people would learn everything needed to survive...@ as well as meet and part.]

511914-14_drYeT.json:941.jp: [textBlack:前の世界での疲れや傷を癒し]@[textBlack:学びを充分に終えた魂は、村を去る]@[textBlack:…そして、次の世代に席を譲る]
511914-14_drYeT.json:941.en: [textBlack:Souls whose pains and sorrows from the past world @were healed and who completed their learning @would leave the village... giving up their place @to the next generation.]

511914-14_drYeT.json:944.jp: [textBlack:それから記憶のまっさらな状態に戻って]@[textBlack:別の町に現れ、新しい人生を始めるわけ]
511914-14_drYeT.json:944.en: [textBlack:Afterwards their memories would be wiped clean as @blank slates, and they would appear in other towns @to start their new lives.]

511914-14_drYeT.json:947.jp: [textBlack:いわば、魂の休憩所]@[textBlack:兼、生きるための練習場のような場所…]@[textBlack:それがこの村なんじゃないか、って]
511914-14_drYeT.json:947.en: [textBlack:In other words, it could be said that this village is a @lounge for souls, an area to practice living in...]

511914-14_drYeT.json:950.jp: [textBlack:旅人はね]@[textBlack:そんな物語を何かの本で読んだんだって]
511914-14_drYeT.json:950.en: [textBlack: The traveller told me they read a story about here @in some book. ]

511914-14_drYeT.json:953.jp: [textBlack:その場所は、“魂の学び舎”…]@[textBlack:そこを出ていくことは、“卒業”…]@[textBlack:物語では、そう呼ばれていたみたい]
511914-14_drYeT.json:953.en: [textBlack: This place was called the “School of Souls”... @where leaving, is “graduating”... @In the story, it appears they were called @as such.]

511918-18_drYeT.json:345.jp: [textBlack:３人で歩く、雨の日の帰り道]@[textBlack:幼馴染のあの子が、水たまりに…]@[textBlack:ほら、バッシャーン！]
511918-18_drYeT.json:345.en: [textBlack:As the three of us walk home after the rain,] @[textBlack:my childhood friend sees a puddle... @and goes, splash!]

511918-18_drYeT.json:353.jp: [textBlack:自然に避けてるあの子みたいに]@[textBlack:もっと早く気づけるようになるには]@[textBlack:どうしたらいいのかな…？]
511918-18_drYeT.json:353.en: [textBlack:How can I learn to notice it sooner,] @[textBlack:like my friend who naturally avoids it...?]

511918-18_drYeT.json:474.jp: [textBlack:せいらちゃ…]@[textBlack:フューチャースターが散歩から戻らない]@[textBlack:四半刻が経過した…現代風に言うと30分だ]@[textBlack:無人の商店街のはずなのに、どこを歩いて…？]
511918-18_drYeT.json:474.en: [textBlack:Seira-ch... *ahem* @Future Star still hasn’t returned from @her walk,] @[textBlack:and it’s already been a quarter of a double-hour...]@[textBlack:Thirty minutes, if I were to use modern terms.]

511918-18_drYeT.json:969.jp: [textBlack:あの子と初めて登った山頂で味わった幸せ]@[textBlack:それは、ずっとずっと前…]@[textBlack:“家族”と一緒に登って以来の感覚だと思えた]
511918-18_drYeT.json:969.en: [textBlack:The first time I climbed to the top @of the mountain with her,]@ [textBlack:I felt a happiness that I hadn't felt since I climbed @with my “family” a long, long time ago.]

511918-18_drYeT.json:977.jp: [textBlack:そう言ったら、あの子は答えた]@[textBlack:『…“家族”って、何？』]@[textBlack:私は言葉に詰まってしまった]
511918-18_drYeT.json:977.en: [textBlack:When I said that to her, she replied, @“...What’s “family”?” I was at a loss for words.]

511919-19_drYeT.json:380.jp: [textBlack:“言葉”を口にすることができたのは]@[textBlack:世界に先駆けて在った３人の賢者だった]
511919-19_drYeT.json:380.en: [textBlack:It was three wise sages, the first to exist in this world, @who said the “word”.]

511919-19_drYeT.json:386.jp: [textBlack:「うーん…考えたことなかったけど]@[textBlack:冬かな、クリスマスがあるから」]
511919-19_drYeT.json:386.en: [textBlack:Hmm... I haven’t given it much thought, @but it’s probably winter, @since there’s Christmas.]

511919-19_drYeT.json:389.jp: [textBlack:賢者のひとりがそう言うと]@[textBlack:ひとつの光が生まれた]
511919-19_drYeT.json:389.en: [textBlack:When one of the wise sages said as such, @a light was born.]

511919-19_drYeT.json:392.jp: [textBlack:光はひとつの星となり]@[textBlack:世界の果てより、虚空を照らし続けた…]
511919-19_drYeT.json:392.en: [textBlack:That light became a star, and from the end of the world, @it illuminated the void for all eternity...]

511919-19_drYeT.json:767.jp: [textBlack:大破してレストアは無理]@[textBlack:だから、廃車にするしかなかった]
511919-19_drYeT.json:767.en: [textBlack:It's wrecked and impossible to restore, @so I had no choice but to scrap it.]

511919-19_drYeT.json:770.jp: [textBlack:はぁ…]@[textBlack:次のバイク、どうやって調達しよう？]
511919-19_drYeT.json:770.en: [textBlack:Haah... How am I going to get my next bike?]

511920-20_drYeT.json:131.jp: [textBlack:いつも表情の読めないラビさんも]@[textBlack:心なしか、不機嫌な様子…]@[textBlack:いつ言い出せばいいんですの…？]
511920-20_drYeT.json:131.en: [textBlack:Even the usually expressionless Rabi-san seems to be in somewhat of a low mood...] @[textBlack:When would be the right time to tell her...?]

512010-5_WZhB8.json:23.jp: [textBlack:20××年12月××日　15:10]@[textBlack:こうして、ふたりのしゅごれいが]@[textBlack:ほつれたきずなをむすびなおしてくれた]@[textBlack:おかげで…]
512010-5_WZhB8.json:23.en: [textBlack:20××, December ××, 15:10]@[textBlack:Thus, thanks to the two Guardian Spirits]@[textBlack:who retied the frayed bonds...]

512010-5_WZhB8.json:32.jp: [textBlack:ふたごは、おそろいのてぶくろで]@[textBlack:たのしくクリスマスをすごすことが]@[textBlack:できたのでした]
512010-5_WZhB8.json:32.en: [textBlack:The twins were able to enjoy Christmas]@[textBlack:together with their matching gloves.]

512010-6_WZhB8.json:35.jp: [textBlack:こうはいはクリスマスのおはなしを]@[textBlack:マンガにしてみせましたが]@[textBlack:せんぱいは、ぜんぜんほめてくれませんでした]
512010-6_WZhB8.json:35.en: [textBlack:The girl showed a Christmas story,]@[textBlack:but the genius artist offered no compliments at all.]

512010-6_WZhB8.json:38.jp: [textBlack:それでもこうはいは]@[textBlack:めげずにマンガをかきつづけ…]
512010-6_WZhB8.json:38.en: [textBlack:Despite that,]@[textBlack:the girl was not discouraged]@[textBlack:and continued to draw...]

512010-6_WZhB8.json:41.jp: [textBlack:このひは]@[textBlack:とっておきのおはなしをおもいついて]@[textBlack:せんぱいにみせたのでした]
512010-6_WZhB8.json:41.en: [textBlack:On this day,]@[textBlack:she showed her mentor a treasured story.]

512020-8_ki7rX.json:704.jp: [textBlack:「あれは紛れもなく]@[textBlack:あの子の未来だよ」]

512020-8_ki7rX.json:723.jp: [textBlack:「あの子は幸せな未来を]@[textBlack:歩み続けている]@[textBlack:…不思議なくらいにね」]
512020-8_ki7rX.json:723.en: [textBlack:But that girl will]@[textBlack:continue to walk]@[textBlack:towards a happy future...]@[textBlack:as odd as that is.]

512020-8_ki7rX.json:743.jp: [textBlack:『もう少し先の未来を]@[textBlack:覗いてみよーか？』]
512020-8_ki7rX.json:743.en: [textBlack:Do you want to take]@[textBlack:a peek a little farther]@[textBlack:into the future?]

512020-8_ki7rX.json:774.jp: [textBlack:「新たなページが]@[textBlack:刻まれてゆく…」]

512020-9_ki7rX.json:277.jp: [textBlack:『もう少し先の未来を]@[textBlack:覗いてみよーか？』]
512020-9_ki7rX.json:277.en: [textBlack:Do you want to take]@[textBlack:a peek a little farther]@[textBlack:into the future?]

512020-9_ki7rX.json:311.jp: [textBlack:「新たなページが]@[textBlack:刻まれてゆく…」]

512201-3_Kum8H.json:363.jp: [textBlack:・ごく最近になって流行り出した]@[textBlack:・見た目に関することは不明]
512201-3_Kum8H.json:363.en: [textBlack:・Your memory will be ripped apart.]@[textBlack:・It has only spread recently.]@[textBlack:・Appearance unknown.]

512201-3_Kum8H.json:1010.jp: [textBlack:・名前に関して]@[textBlack:　名前を聞かれる]@[textBlack:　答えると刃物で切り裂かれるが無事]@[textBlack:　記憶を切り裂かれる]@[textBlack:　答えてはいけないけど、答えないといけない]
512201-3_Kum8H.json:1010.en: [textBlack:・Regarding names]@[textBlack:   You will be asked your name.]@[textBlack:   If you answer, the knife will slash you,]@[textBlack:   but you will be unharmed.]@[textBlack:   Your memory will be ripped apart.]@[textBlack:   You shouldn’t answer, but you have to.]

512203-1_Kum8H.json:534.jp: [textBlack:・名前に関して]@[textBlack:　名前を聞かれる]@[textBlack:　答えると刃物で切り裂かれるが無事]@[textBlack:　記憶を切り裂かれる]@[textBlack:　答えてはいけないけど、答えないといけない]
512203-1_Kum8H.json:534.en: [textBlack:・Regarding names]@[textBlack:   You will be asked your name.]@[textBlack:   If you answer, the knife will slash you,]@[textBlack:   but you will be unharmed.]@[textBlack:   Your memory will be ripped apart.]@[textBlack:   You shouldn’t answer, but you have to.]

512205-4_Kum8H.json:190.jp: [textBlack:ホントにホント？]@[textBlack:その名前@正しくなければ　ズッタズタ！]@[textBlack:ズタズタ切り裂き]@[textBlack:記憶もちぐはぐ　ズッタ]
512205-4_Kum8H.json:190.en: [textBlack:Oh, but is that name]@[textBlack:really true?]@[textBlack:If not, I’ll rip and tear!]@[textBlack:I’ll tear your memories to shreds,]@[textBlack:so you’d better be]

512206-1_5MqTz.json:38.jp: [textBlack:ホントにホント？]@[textBlack:その名前@正しくなければ　ズッタズタ！]@[textBlack:ズタズタ切り裂き]@[textBlack:記憶もちぐはぐ　ズッタ]
512206-1_5MqTz.json:38.en: [textBlack:Oh, but is that name]@[textBlack:really true?]@[textBlack:If not, I’ll rip and tear!]@[textBlack:I’ll tear your memories to shreds,]@[textBlack:so you’d better be]

512206-3_5MqTz.json:143.jp: [textBlack:・名前に関して]@[textBlack:　名前を聞かれる]@[textBlack:　答えると刃物で切り裂かれるが無事]@[textBlack:　記憶を切り裂かれる]@[textBlack:　答えてはいけないけど、答えないといけない]
512206-3_5MqTz.json:143.en: [textBlack:・Regarding names]@[textBlack:   You will be asked your name.]@[textBlack:   If you answer, the knife will slash you,]@[textBlack:   but you will be unharmed.]@[textBlack:   Your memory will be ripped apart.]@[textBlack:   You shouldn’t answer, but you have to.]

512206-3_5MqTz.json:149.jp: [textBlack:・取り込まれる]@[textBlack:　取り込まれたチサトが]@[textBlack:　かのこさんがいない理由を]@[textBlack:　アリサに説明した時の言葉]
512206-3_5MqTz.json:149.en: [textBlack:・"She's been absorbed"]@[textBlack:   What Chisato said to explain why]@[textBlack:   Kanoko wasn't there to Arisa,]@[textBlack:   right before being absorbed and]@[textBlack:   assimilated herself]

512211-3_5MqTz.json:1115.jp: [textBlack:無くした名前はすぐそこにあるって]@[textBlack:廃墟の迷子たちの間ではもっぱらのウワサ]
512211-3_5MqTz.json:1115.en: [textBlack:They say the lost name is right there in plain sight.]@[textBlack:It's the hottest rumor that the girls lost in]@[textBlack:abandoned ruins are talking about!]

512610-7_NTfaR.json:327.jp: [textBlack:・校舎うらに何かあるらしい]@[textBlack:・変な声が聞こえる]@[textBlack:・パワースポットがある？]@[textBlack:・“ホコラ”がある]
512610-7_NTfaR.json:327.en: [textBlack:・Apparently there's something strange behind the]@[textBlack:  school]@[textBlack:・People have heard strange voices]@[textBlack:・Might be a "power spot"?]@[textBlack:・There's an old shrine there]

512620-11_HxTD7.json:677.jp: [textBlack:見た目ぐちゃっとした激ヤバリボンを]@[textBlack:ゲットすると…]@[textBlack:夢の使者が]@[textBlack:お悩み解決してくれるらしーんだけど]@[textBlack:誰か売ってるとこしらね？]
512620-11_HxTD7.json:677.en: [textBlack:if u get some sorta tangley, SUPER crazy ribbon]@[textBlack:the dream angels gonna come solve ur problems]@[textBlack:any1 kno where i can get 1?]

619001-1_F5Syz.json:412.jp: [textBlack:優勝者には]@[textBlack:アンティーク着物のアレンジで有名な]@[textBlack:愚路川和路璃先生の]@[textBlack:オリジナル作品をプレゼント！]
619001-1_F5Syz.json:412.en: [textBlack:The winner will receive an original]@[textBlack:piece from Waloli Gurokawa, renowned]@[textBlack:for her antique kimono arrangements!]

710051-1.json:157.jp: ほらっ、ぬ[chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.1][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]・ぎ[chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.1][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]・な[chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.1][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]・さ[chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.1][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]・い！
